wikipedia_page.main: Rupert Oliver Matthews (born 5 December 1961) is a British Conservative Party politician serving as the Leicestershire Police and Crime Commissioner since 2021. He previously served as a Member of the European Parliament (MEP) for the East Midlands from June 2017 until his term ended on 1 July 2019, and has authored books on the paranormal.

response: William Stephen Goulden "Willy" Bach, Baron Bach (born 25 December 1946) is a British Labour member of the House of Lords. He was a Parliamentary Under-Secretary of State in the Ministry of Justice from 2008 to 2010. He resigned from the opposition front bench when he was elected the Leicestershire Police and Crime Commissioner on 6 May 2016. He did not stand again at the 2021 PCC election and was succeeded by the Conservative Rupert Matthews.
* ‘Better Off Out’ Campaigns Manager: Rupert Matthews
* Monster Mysteries, by Rupert Matthews (Hove, Wayland, 1988 )
* The First Settlements, by Rupert Matthews (Hove, Wayland, 1990 )
* Rupert Matthews (born 1961), British Conservative Party politician and writer on the paranormal

Lewer was subsequently elected Member of Parliament for Northampton South in the 2017 general election. Following his election win, he stood down as an MEP and was replaced in that role by former author Rupert Matthews.  He retained his seat at the 2019 general election with an increased majority.
